name: core-item
description: `core-item` is a simple line-item object: a label and/or an icon that can also act as a link. Example: To use as a link, put <a> element in the item. Example:

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: The URL of an image for the icon.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Specifies the icon from the Polymer icon set.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Specifies the label for the menu item.
